page.title: 09ST. THOMAS ON THE BOURNE
page.content: The church is in the centre of a populated area , many people come to the church. The Lady Chapel was the original church. The rest of the church was built around the Lady chapel. The church was supposed to be much bigger but the building work was held up when the war started. After the war it was never finished because of the cost. They managed to build a small porch and a bell tower. There is a lot of ground around the church and it is set with many unusual shrubs. It also contains a burial ground. In one corner, close to the road is a memorial cross to the dead of both world wars. A service is held here on the Sunday nearest to 11th November. The choir is of a high standard,
